title: Bug 129569HCGBIDI: Undesirable order of BiDI chars in Query window
description: Bug 129569HCGBIDI: Undesirable order of BiDI chars in Query window. This is a BiDI-specific defect.
OB: In the Query screen of the Edit Data Set dialog, the order of BiDi (Hebrew or Arabic) characters is incorrect.
EB: The order of BiDi characters in the Query screen should be preserved and readable.
SR:
1. Open the Query screen in the Edit Data Set dialog.
2. Enter or select a dataset.
3. Verify that the order of BiDi characters in the query is incorrect.
